description: This course is designed for the person who has a basic understanding of the adobe programs, primarily Photoshop, Premiere Pro, AfterEffects and also Maxon Cinema4D. You don't have to be a master in these programs, as long as they don't intimidate you and you can navigate the interface, you can go through this course quite easily. This course is not to teach you about these programs per say , it's about using them together to complete projects in the area of Events promotion.
title: Events Promotion Design
